p: The Bocharov Model [ 30] contains 49 parameters and was designed to fit experimental in vivo data from humans [ 6, 7]. It includes 10 variables and 51 reactions ( Figure A9). Only here and in the Lee Model (below) we have differential equations with delay, i.e., some rates depend on variable values from the past ( Figure 13a). Because the delay does not matter in a steady-state, we can also neglect the delay when analyzing the chemical organizations of a delay differential equation model.
